content: large throw measures 47½ 120 5 cm wide x 69 long 75 5 cm small throw measures 36½ 92 5 cm wide x 69 long 75 5 cm combine three color families of purple blue and green in 17 actual different colors of yarn to crochet this gorgeous throw it will add texture color and beauty to any room gauge/gauge gauge 1 ripple = 5½ 14 cm from peak to peak 6 row = 4 10 cm **17 color version** red heart® super saver® 1 skein each 776 dark orchid a 528 medium purple b 530 orchid c 579 pale plum d 358 lavender e 347 light periwinkle f 885 delft g 886 blue h 385 royal i 656 real teal j 3862 jade k 512 turqua l 505 aruba sea m 668 honeydew n 624 tea leaf o 406 med thyme p and 389 hunter green q **6 color version** red heart® classic™ 3 skeins each 401 nickel a 412 silver b 339 mid brown c 336 warm brown d 645 honey gold e 12 black f link to 6 color version 1 **5 color version** red heart® with love® 4 balls each 1207 cornsilk a 1308 tan b 1601 lettuce c 1803 blue hawaii d 1621 evergreen e link to 5 color version 2 video tutorial 3 1 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/6-color-radiating-ripple-throw 2 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/5-color-radiating-ripple-throw 3 http //www redheart com/learn/videos/learn-how-crochet-radiating-ripple-throw
